Extra

Arts from WikiArt

Interesting clustering of artworks scavenged from famous database. Surprising or not, serves as a good portfolio for t-SNE capabilities. NLP preprocessing (secret word embeddings and word2vec)

Events data

Ever wondered where is the true heart of the city? It’s where you can find most fun, certainly. Look at the figures below - does it look like a single city?
